summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4281 for the improvement of Ashworth Avenue, from North 55th Street to East Green Lake Way; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 50876, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
